question: A Client wants to retrieve a representation of a resource, e.g. an XML document, localized according to the preferences of the user. Each user is allowed to specify one or more languages, in order of preference. Such preferences are application independent. How can the Client send language preference Information to the Server using a standard HTTP facility?
